verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shoshannim, A Psalm of David. Save <WH3467> me <WH430>, O God; For the waters <WH4325> are come <WH935> in unto my soul <WH5315>.
I sink <WH2883> in deep <WH4688> mire <WH3121>, where there is no standing <WH4613>: I am come <WH935> into deep <WH4615> waters <WH4325>, where the floods <WH7641> overflow me <WH7857>.
I am weary <WH3021> with my crying <WH7121>; my throat <WH1627> is dried <WH2787>: Mine eyes <WH5869> fail <WH3615> while I wait <WH3176> for my God <WH430>.

They that hate <WH8130> me without a cause <WH2600> are more <WH7231> than the hairs <WH8185> of my head <WH7218>: They that would cut me off <WH6789>, being mine enemies <WH341> wrongfully <WH8267>, are mighty <WH6105>: That which I took not away <WH1497> I have to restore <WH7725>.
O God <WH430>, thou knowest <WH3045> my foolishness <WH200>; And my sins <WH819> are not hid from thee <WH3582>.

Let not them that wait <WH6960> for thee be put to shame <WH954> through me <WH136>, O Lord Jehovah <WH3069> of hosts <WH6635>: Let not those that seek <WH1245> thee be brought to dishonor <WH3637> through me <WH430>, O God of Israel <WH3478>.
Because for thy sake I have borne <WH5375> reproach <WH2781>; Shame <WH3639> hath covered <WH3680> my face <WH6440>.
I am become a stranger <WH2114> unto my brethren <WH251>, And an alien <WH5237> unto my mother <WH517>'s children <WH1121>.
For the zeal <WH7068> of thy house <WH1004> hath eaten me up <WH398>; And the reproaches <WH2781> of them that reproach <WH2778> thee are fallen upon me <WH5307>.
When I wept <WH1058>, and chastened my soul <WH5315> with fasting <WH6685>, That was to my reproach <WH2781>.
When I made <WH5414> sackcloth <WH8242> my clothing <WH3830>, I became a byword unto them <WH4912>.
They that sit in <WH3427> the gate <WH8179> talk <WH7878> of me <WH5058>; And I am the song of the drunkards <WH8354>.

But as for me <WH8605>, my prayer is unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, in an acceptable <WH7522> time <WH6256>: O God <WH430>, in the abundance <WH7230> of thy lovingkindness <WH2617>, Answer <WH6030> me in the truth <WH571> of thy salvation <WH3468>.
Deliver <WH5337> me out of the mire <WH2916>, and let me not sink <WH2883>: Let me be delivered <WH5337> from them that hate <WH8130> me <WH4615>, and out of the deep waters <WH4325>.
Let not the waterflood <WH4325> overwhelm <WH7857> me <WH4688>, Neither let the deep shallow me up <WH1104>; And let not the pit <WH875> shut <WH332> its mouth upon me <WH6310>.
Answer <WH6030> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah; for thy lovingkindness <WH2617> is good <WH2896>: According to the multitude <WH7230> of thy tender mercies <WH7356> turn thou unto me <WH6437>.
And hide <WH5641> not thy face <WH6440> from thy servant <WH5650>; For I am in distress <WH6887>; answer <WH6030> me speedily <WH4118>.
Draw nigh <WH7126> unto my soul <WH5315>, and redeem <WH1350> it <WH6299>: Ransom me because of mine enemies <WH341>.
Thou knowest <WH3045> my reproach <WH2781>, and my shame <WH2781>, and my dishonor <WH1322>: Mine adversaries are all before thee <WH6887>.

Reproach <WH2781> hath broken <WH7665> my heart <WH3820>; and I am full of heaviness <WH5136>: And I looked <WH6960> for some to take pity <WH5110>, but there was none <WH5162>; And for comforters, but I found none <WH4672>.
They gave <WH5414> me also gall <WH7219> for my food <WH1267>; And in my thirst <WH6772> they gave me vinegar <WH2558> to drink <WH8248>.
Let their table <WH7979> before <WH6440> them become a snare <WH6341>; And when they are in peace <WH7965>, let it become a trap <WH4170>.
Let their eyes <WH5869> be darkened <WH2821>, so that they cannot see <WH7200>; And make their loins <WH4975> continually <WH8548> to shake <WH4571>.
Pour out <WH8210> thine indignation <WH2195> upon them <WH2740>, And let the fierceness of thine anger <WH639> overtake them <WH5381>.
Let their habitation <WH2918> be desolate <WH8074>; Let none dwell <WH3427> in their tents <WH168>.
For they persecute <WH7291> him whom thou hast smitten <WH5221>; And they tell <WH5608> of the sorrow <WH4341> of those whom thou hast wounded <WH2491>.
Add <WH5414> iniquity <WH5771> unto their iniquity <WH5771>; And let them not come <WH935> into thy righteousness <WH6666>.
Let them be blotted <WH4229> out of the book <WH5612> of life <WH2416>, And not be written <WH3789> with the righteous <WH6662>.
But I am poor <WH6041> and sorrowful <WH3510>: Let thy salvation <WH3444>, O God <WH430>, set me up on high <WH7682>.
I will praise <WH1984> the name <WH8034> of God <WH430> with a song <WH7892>, And will magnify <WH1431> him with thanksgiving <WH8426>.
And it will please <WH3190> Jehovah <WH3068> better <WH3190> than an ox <WH7794>, Or a bullock <WH6499> that hath horns <WH7160> and hoofs <WH6536>.
The meek <WH6035> have seen <WH7200> it <WH8055>, and are glad: Ye that seek <WH1875> after God <WH430>, let your heart <WH3824> live <WH2421>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> heareth <WH8085> the needy <WH34>, And despiseth <WH959> not his prisoners <WH615>.
Let heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776> praise <WH1984> him <WH3220>, The seas, and everything that moveth therein <WH7430>.
For God <WH430> will save <WH3467> Zion <WH6726>, and build <WH1129> the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>; And they shall abide there <WH3423>, and have it in possession.
The seed <WH2233> also of his servants <WH5650> shall inherit <WH5157> it <WH157>; And they that love his name <WH8034> shall dwell therein <WH7931>.
